          <title>
            <string language="de">Der räumliche Bau von Molekülen. Anleitung zum Ableiten der Molkülgeometrie</string>
            <string language="en">The spatial structure of molecules. Guideline for the deduction of the molecular geometry</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La structure spatiale des molécules. 
Directive pour la déduction de la géométrie moléculaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A estrutura spatial das moléculas. 
Guideline para a dedução da geometria molecular</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La struttura spaziale delle molecole. Guida
di riferimento per la deduzione della geometria molecolare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η χωρική δομή των μορίων. Οδηγία για την 
αφαίρεση της μοριακής γεωμετρίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La estructura espacial de moléculas. Guía
de consulta para la deducción de la geometría molecular</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Arbeitsblatt zur Ermiitlung der Molekülgeometrie von zehn verschiedenen Verbindungen.</string>
            <string language="en">Worksheet on the determination of the molecule geometry of ten different compounds.</string>
          </description>
